about_the_game:
Build, Manage, and Race in the World of GTR - Garage Town Racing

Take the wheel and control your own garage in GTR - Garage Town Racing, where you’re more than just a driver! This management and racing game lets you customize and enhance every detail of your workshop and cars. Collect exclusive vehicles, build models from scratch, and challenge friends in thrilling PvP races!

GTR - Garage Town Racing combines the adrenaline of racing with management strategy, offering players the chance to transform a small garage into the biggest hub in a city full of automotive enthusiasts.

Game Features

  • Expand and upgrade your workspace, attract more clients, and increase profits while transforming your garage into a powerhouse.

  • Compete against friends in real-time challenges and prove that your garage produces the city’s best cars. 

  • From engines to paint, customize every detail of your cars. Decorate your garage to stand out and attract new clients. 

  • Find exclusive parts, manufacture original vehicles, and create a one-of-a-kind collection of cars.

  • Visit friends' garages, challenge them to races, and trade rare parts to upgrade your inventory.

A Personalized Racing & Management Experience

In GTR - Garage Town Racing, the passion for cars goes far beyond the track. Customize every detail of your car, prepare for exciting races, and build connections with other players as you transform your garage into a workshop that stands out.

If you’re a fan of racing and strategy, GTR - Garage Town Racing offers the best of both worlds, in a setting where your workshop is the city’s core, and the open road is your stage.
